ayi­e­sa­yi­es thrastha­wa­daya eka thana­kin awa­san nowana bawath, ek thana­kin pasu eya thawath thana­kin mathu wana bawath, thrastha­wa­daya aluth thana­kata pamina thibena bawath, apa etha­nata suda­nam wiya yuthu bawath kami­tuwa hamuwe pawasu agra­ma­thya­wa­raya me wana wita rate aara­kshawa wenu­wen piya­wara rasak gena athi bawin jana­tha­wata biya wimata kisidu hethu­wak natha­yida kiya siti­yeya.

shri lankawehi samaja ha aarthika sanwardhanaya udesa pramukha karyabharayak itukaramin kapipenena lesa dayaka wu wasara gananawak pura shri lankawata labadun japana sanwardhana sahayogithawa janadhipathi rajapaksha mahatha itha ihalin agaya kaleya.1982di parlimenthu sankirnaya idikirima sandaha ek wu japana mulyayathana samuhaye dayakathwaya sihipath kala rajapaksha janadhipathiwaraya parlimenthu sankirnaye aithihasika watinakama ha suwisheshi ananyathawa aaraksha kirima sandaha nawikarana katayuthu wenuwen da mewanima wu sahayogayak balaporoththu wana bawa pawasiya.agamathi abe mahatha shri lankawe thirasara wardhanaya wenuwen akhandawa sahaya wimata athi kamaththa pala kaleya.shri lankawe kalpawathna samaya wenuwen jathika sanhindiyawehi athi wadagathkama thahawuru kala nayaka depala demalaeelam wimukthi koti sanwidhanayata erehi meheyum awasanaye, samaya ha saubhagyaya pramukha awashyathawak wu bawa da pawasuha.
